reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in July 2004.
reviews.title: Great Hotel
Rough with the smooth
reviews.text: We found the entire hotel clean and comfortable and greatful for the airconditioning unit in our room as it was about 90 degrees outside!

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was complementary with a wonderful array of fruits / cereals etc.

reviews.title: Impressive for price
reviews.text: Our trip to Dallas was to visit Dealy Plaza [where President Kennedy was assasinated] and as we were travelling thru-out the States by Greyhound bus [9 weeks] we did not have a vehicle.
